pullRequest.body:
We prove that `CompHaus` and friends are `Precoherent` by proving that they are `Preregular`¬†and `FinitaryExtensive`, removing the previous hacky proofs of characterisations of effective epimorphic families. We also give new, cleaner proofs of those characterisations.

- [x] depends on: #8643 

---

(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

This PR/issue depends on:
* ~~leanprover-community/mathlib4#8643~~
By **[Dependent Issues](https://github.com/z0al/dependent-issues)** (ü§ñ). Happy coding!
<!-- By Dependent Issues (Action) - DO NOT REMOVE -->

This is finally very satisfying, thanks!

bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7126109560/job/19403334955)
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7126109560/job/19403335212)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7126109560/job/19403334695)
It seems to me that all the `Precoherent` instances somehow got dropped. Do I misunderstand what is happening?

```suggestion
# Effective epimorphisms and finite effective epimorphic families in `CompHaus`
```
The instance for `Preregular` moved up, but where did this instance go?

`Precoherent`¬†now follows from `Preregular`¬†and `FinitaryPreExtensive`. So the proof would be `inferInstance`. Then I'm not supposed to state it, right? Or maybe it should be stated as an `example`?
I think stating it as an example is helpful. To remind people like me of this implication (-;

```suggestion
# Effective epimorphisms and finite effective epimorphic families in `Profinite`
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - refactor(Topology): simplify proofs that `CompHaus`¬†and friends are `Precoherent`
